name: Addressgate
overview:
Addressgate connects you to the people that live and work around you.

It is a social utility that connects your home or business to other homes and businesses around you - your neighborhood.

We make it easy for you to communicate with your neighbors, introduce yourself, welcome new families, share valuable neighborhood news and information and discover common interests.

â€¢ To reach out to a neighbor just enter their street address plus the message you wish to send and we make sure the message gets delivered.

â€¢ We make it as easy to post new happenings around your neighborhood as it is to find them. Refine searches by distance, time or let us do it for you.

â€¢ Share a unique virtual curbside view of your street address - a home page for your home. Make this link a part of all future invites.
